document_data.name: Ragathan Furriers
document_data.mainbody: '''Ragathan Furriers''' was a furrier shop in the [[North Ward of Waterdeep|North Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The shop lay on the eastern end of [[Tarsar's Street]] near the intersection with [[Saerdoun Street]].
document_data.Structure: The building was a typical two-story Waterdhavian row house.
document_data.Inhabitants: Around the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, the rooms above Ragathan Furriers were rented by the [[Netherese]] [[sorcerer]] [[Telbran Nelarn]], who had disguised himself as a quiet book collector.
